text:
Task 1 complete. All changes applied to `/Users/masaaki/Desktop/prm/makeimg/backend/services/gemini_image.py` (197 lines):

1. **`_build_contents_with_references()`** (L51-89) - Interleaves reference images with descriptions, wraps with instruction template
2. **`_enhance_prompt()`** (L92-99) - Adds quality enhancement prefix
3. **`generate_image()` signature** (L102-111) - Added `reference_descriptions`, `reference_instruction`, `enhance_prompt` params
4. **Docstring** (L115-124) - Updated with new parameter descriptions
5. **Content building logic** (L131-145) - Replaced inline loop with `_build_contents_with_references()` + `_enhance_prompt()` calls

Existing constants and functions (`_get_client`, `_load_reference_image`, `list_available_models`) are untouched.
